Full Body Massages.title: Mom To Be
Full Body Massages.description: Through gentle techniques and correct positioning, we alleviate common pregnancy discomforts such as back pain and swelling. This ensures comfort and safety for both mother and baby, promoting relaxation and overall well-being.

image.alt: Prenatal Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Herbal Thai
Full Body Massages.description: A delicate massage that combines relaxing techniques with essential oils, specially selected to calm the mind and revitalize the body. Aroma Therapy reduces stress, improves mood, and offers a unique sensory experience.

image.alt: Herbal Thai Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Aroma Therapy
Full Body Massages.description: A delicate massage that combines relaxing techniques with essential oils, specially selected to calm the mind and revitalize the body. Aroma Therapy reduces stress, improves mood, and offers a unique sensory experience.

image.alt: Aroma Therapy Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: LOMI LOMI
Full Body Massages.description: Long, fluid movements are used for deep relaxation. The holistic technique releases tension, improves circulation, and restores inner balance.

image.alt: Lomi Lomi Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: LOMI LOMI with Cupping
Full Body Massages.description: Lomi Lomi with Cupping blends the long, flowing movements of Lomi Lomi massage with cupping therapy, an alternative technique that creates vacuum on the skin to stimulate circulation, release muscle tension, and support toxin elimination. This combination is chosen for deep relaxation and stress relief, with pressure always adjusted for comfort. After the session, temporary circular red marks may appear on the skin, which are harmless and fade naturally.

image.alt: Lomi Lomi with Cupping at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Thai
Full Body Massages.description: A combination of assisted stretches, rhythmic pressure, and gentle twists to improve flexibility, release muscle tension, and restore energy flow, leaving you balanced and revitalized.

image.alt: Thai Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Deep Tissue
Full Body Massages.description: Firm pressure and slow movements, professionally applied to reach deep layers of muscles and connective tissues, effectively relieving chronic tension and muscle pain.

image.alt: Deep Tissue Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Deep Tissue with Cupping
Full Body Massages.description: Deep Tissue with Cupping combines deep, targeted massage techniques with cupping therapy, which creates vacuum on the skin to stimulate circulation, release deep-seated muscle tension, and support toxin elimination. It is commonly chosen for muscle stiffness, accumulated discomfort, and overuse, with pressure always adjusted for comfort. After the session, temporary circular red marks may appear on the skin, which are harmless and fade naturally.

image.alt: Deep Tissue with Cupping at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Anti-Cellulite
Full Body Massages.description: Energetic movements and kneading techniques performed with carefully selected bamboo sticks that stimulate blood circulation and improve skin tone for a smoother and firmer appearance.

image.alt: Anti-Cellulite Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Hot Stone
Full Body Massages.description: Hot stones are placed on key points of the body to remove muscle tension, reduce stress, and promote a deep state of relaxation.

image.alt: Hot Stone Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Authentic Balinese
Full Body Massages.description: Traditional Balinese technique that combines deep pressure and fluid movements for complete relaxation and release of muscle tension.

image.alt: Authentic Balinese Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Authentic Balinese with Cupping
Full Body Massages.description: Authentic Balinese with Cupping combines traditional Balinese massage techniques with cupping therapy, which creates vacuum on the skin to stimulate circulation, release muscle tension, and support toxin elimination. This combination is chosen for deep relaxation and tension relief, with pressure always adjusted for comfort. After the session, temporary circular red marks may appear on the skin, which are harmless and fade naturally.

image.alt: Authentic Balinese with Cupping at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Bali Zen Signature
Full Body Massages.description: We combine a variety of Asian techniques that help you completely relax your body, also improving conditions such as muscle pain or chronic fatigue. The experience includes reflexology, facial and scalp massage ensuring perfect well-being.

image.alt: Bali Zen Signature Massage

Full Body Massages.title: Lymphatic Drainage Massage
Full Body Massages.description: Lymphatic drainage massage is a delicate therapy that stimulates lymph circulation, helping to eliminate toxins and reduce water retention. It is ideal for detoxification, combating cellulite, and supporting immunity.

image.alt: Lymphatic Drainage Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: 4 Hands Massage
Full Body Massages.description: The 4 hands massage is a deeply relaxing experience, performed by two therapists working perfectly synchronized on the entire body. This technique intensely stimulates circulation and releases physical and mental tension in a short time.

image.alt: 4 Hands Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Tandem Massage (2 people)
Full Body Massages.description: The tandem massage for 2 people takes place simultaneously, in the same room, offering a synchronized relaxation experience alongside a loved one. It is the perfect choice for couples or friends who want to reconnect and enjoy pampering moments together.

image.alt: Tandem Massage (2 people) at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Candle Massage
Full Body Massages.description: Perfect for cool days, this relaxation massage uses a special wax made from essential oils, which, once melted, transforms into a warm and velvety oil. The fine scents and gentle touch restore body balance and a deep sense of comfort.

image.alt: Candle Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Bali Zen Winter
Full Body Massages.description: The ritual begins with a foot scrub, followed by a Balinese massage with warm cinnamon and clove oils that stimulate circulation, tone the skin, and deeply relax. Their festive aroma brings the holiday spirit to the skin, and the experience ends with a cervical, facial, and scalp massage for balance and complete well-being.

image.alt: Balizen Winter Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Bali Zen Harmony
Full Body Massages.description: This type of massage harmoniously combines Lomi Lomi for deep relaxation and improved circulation, Thai for flexibility, mobility and tension release, and hot stones for deep tension relief and total comfort. The result is a complete massage that rebalances the body, calms the mind and restores natural energy.

image.alt: Bali Zen Harmony Massage at Bali Zen

Full Body Massages.title: Bali Zen Slim Combo
Full Body Massages.description: Combined with intensive anti-cellulite techniques and deep lymphatic drainage, this massage activates circulation, flushes out toxins, and sculpts your silhouette for visible results and a feeling of lightness and firmness.

image.alt: Bali Zen Slim Combo at Bali Zen

Local Massages.title: Back & Shoulders
Local Massages.description: We combine kneading and applied pressure techniques to release tension in the back and shoulders. Back pain will be alleviated and you will feel revitalized.

image.alt: Back & Shoulders Massage at Bali Zen

Local Massages.title: Back & Shoulders with Cupping
Local Massages.description: Back & Shoulders with Cupping combines manual massage with cupping therapy, an alternative technique that applies cups to the skin to create vacuum (negative pressure), stimulating circulation, releasing muscle tension, and supporting toxin elimination. It is commonly chosen for musculoskeletal discomfort, stress, and relaxation, with pressure always adjusted for comfort. After the session, temporary circular red marks may appear on the skin, which are harmless and fade naturally.

image.alt: Back & Shoulders with Cupping at Bali Zen

Local Massages.title: Head & Shoulders
Local Massages.description: A perfect way to release tension, reduce headaches, and promote relaxation in the neck, shoulders, and scalp area through light kneading and pressure techniques.

image.alt: Head & Shoulders Massage at Bali Zen

Local Massages.title: Head & Face
Local Massages.description: Through gentle, circular movements and pressure application, we alleviate tension, reduce headaches, and stimulate circulation, leaving the scalp and facial muscles relaxed and revitalized for a radiant appearance.

image.alt: Head & Face Massage at Bali Zen

Local Massages.title: Foot Massage
Local Massages.description: We apply firm but gentle enough pressure on key points of the feet, which helps optimize energy flow and promotes blood circulation. Additionally, the experience includes a foot scrub.

image.alt: Foot Massage at Bali Zen
